title: EkE cintisutiddi
sahitya:
EkE cintisutiddi kOti manave


anupallavi

  lOkanAthana nenedu sukhiyAgu manave


caraNam 1    huTTuvAgApattigAru cintisidavaru kaTTa kaDeyali layake yAra cinte 
naTTa naDuvina bALigEke cintisutiruve huTTidavarige mUru baTTillave maruLe
    caraNam 2    navilinge citra patravanAru baredavaru pavaLadAlatege kempiTTavaru yAru 
savimAtinara giNige hasiru baLidavarAru ava mADidava namma maretihane maruLe
    caraNam 3    basiroLage shishuvanu adAru salahidavaru vasudheyanu basiroLiTTiruvarAru 
hasa keDade namma shrI purandara viTTalana bisaja pAdava nambi sukhiyAgu maruLe
